snippet.title: Dance Dance Revolution Disney Grooves (Wii) Trailer.
snippet.description:
The official trailer for Dance Dance Revolution Disney Grooves for the Wii, set to be released in April of this year.

Remember to add "&fmt=18" to the end of the video URL to listen to it in high quality.


If you're a fan of DDR, come join the official DDR community! Contribute to polls, give feedback to Konami, connect with other DDR players, and get the latest DDR news!

http://www.ddronlinecommunity.com/
